channel.title: CVE Feed for Go standard library -- net/url
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Go standard library -- net/url

item.title: CVE-2022-32190|2024-08-03T07:32:56.001Z -- go%20standard%20library -- net%2Furl
item.description: JoinPath and URL.JoinPath do not remove ../ path elements appended to a relative path. For example, JoinPath("https://go.dev", "../go") returns the URL "https://go.dev/../go", despite the JoinPath documentation stating that ../ path elements are removed from the result.
